summary: 17 CFR § 230.902 provides definitions for terms used in Regulation S, including "debt securities," which encompass non-equity securities, non-participatory preferred stock, and asset-backed securities, and "designated offshore securities market," which includes specific foreign exchanges and any market designated by the Commission. It also defines "directed selling efforts" as activities aimed at conditioning the U.S. market for securities offered under Regulation S, excluding certain legally required advertisements and other specified activities.
